name: Chased Charly: The Bunny Side of the Moon
name_original: Chased Charly: The Bunny Side of the Moon
description:
A platform/runner game about a bunny on a bike escaping death. Made in two days for the Bahía Game Jam 2020

Made using Godot Engine by

Pepper (me) - game design

Redcouz - 2D art

Martín (one half of Kwyjibo) - coding

Santiagomusic - music, sound design

Yesica (the other half of Kwyjibo)- sound design
